board.name: au50
board.display_name: Alveo U50 Data Center Accelerator Card

image.name: au50_image.jpg
image.display_name: Alveo U50 Data Center Accelerator Card
image.description: Alveo U50 Data Center Accelerator Card

board.description: Alveo U50 Data Center Accelerator Card

component.name: hbm_cattrip
component.description: HBM CATTRIP Active High to gate power supply via Satellite Controller. Please ensure proper connection to PIN J18 and tie low if not connected to the HBM.

component.name: qsfp28_leds
component.description: Status LEDs, 5-3 are for QSFP1 and 2-0 are for QSFP0 in the order [STATUS_LEDY,STATUS_LEDG,ACTIVITY_LED]

component.name: uart_msp
component.description: UART interface to MSP432 Satellite Controller from CMS

component.name: msp_gpio
component.description: GPIO signals from MSP Satellite Controller to the CMS

component.name: qsfp_161mhz
component.description: 1.2V LVDS differential 161 MHz oscillator used as a GT reference clock on the board labelled SYNCE_CLK.

component.name: qsfp_322mhz
component.description: 1.2V LVDS differential 322 MHz oscillator used as a GT reference clock on the board labelled 1588_CLK.

component.name: cmc_clk
component.description: 1.2V LVDS differential 100 MHz oscillator used as CMC differential clock input on the board

component.name: hbm_clk
component.description: 1.2V LVDS differential 100 MHz oscillator used as HBM differential clock input on the board

component.name: pcie_refclk
component.description: Clock input from PCI Express edge connector
